summary: A header file defining Apache's resizable variable length buffer library. It provides data structures and functions for managing buffers that can grow as needed, primarily for string manipulation but also supporting binary data.

logs.message_template: [No explicit message template in header, actual message would be in implementation]
logs.reason: Called when the system runs out of memory while trying to grow a buffer. This is a critical error condition when the server cannot allocate required memory.
logs.resolution: Increase available system memory, reduce server load, or investigate memory leaks that might be exhausting server resources.
